Package logic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataManager
    This is the class that will manage all the data of the game that needs to be shared between the Game instance, and the Narrator class.
    Game
    This is the class that will manage all parts of the game, bringing them together.
    GameThread
    This class controls the execution of the main game code on a separate thread from the GUI.
    InputManager
    This is the class that will manage all the input from the user as your game interacts with the story you design.
    OutputManager
    This is the class that will manage formatting all the output that needs to be printed by the descriptions and action information of the game.
    Random
    This class helps you generate random integers.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Actions
    This enum makes it easier to set up code to let the user choose what to do when they are attacked by montsers in the game.
